message: Let's split the money 50/50 and end the game quickly!
You're lowballing, I'm willing to negotiate, but I want more!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not backing down!
I'm not giving you the majority, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. Take it or leave it!
You're not budging, but I still think I deserve more. I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of you!
I'm not going to give you the majority, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than before. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll try to take advantage of your desperation and squeeze out a better deal for myself!
I'm not going to give in to your demands, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need something in return!
You're not willing to give me what I want, so I'll take what I can get. But I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm not going to give you more than this. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never. I'll take what's left, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my last offer.
